title: Beautiful view of Acropolis
text: the sunset was amazing at this location, the live music was so beautiful, service was the fastest we had encountered on our whole trip and it just felt good to be sitting in the middle of so much good energy and people watch! Food and drinks were fantastic

title: Get the guide!
text: Having the guide made this experience so much better than just going up and down and not knowing what it’s about. She explained the history behind every stop we made and when you get to the top-it’s breath taking! Seeing these sites makes you really think about the history of Greece. This was our first visit to Greece and we loved using the guide to take us to the top of Acropolis!

title: Incredible view
text: The air up there is just different! So beautiful, so peaceful- don’t get me wrong it’s quite a hike lol but well worth it! I wish they had signs so you can find the trail on your way back down

title: Great time
text: It was a wonderful experience- I’ve gotten to know more of the other guests at other wine tastings in different countries but because we were all seated and listening most of the time we didn’t get the opportunity. Spiros was great, very knowledgeable, very friendly, and funny trio. We had a great time- thank you!

title: Great tourist activity
text: Our tour guide, Kevin, was absolutely fantastic! Hilarious, knowledgeable, and super friendly. We enjoyed the tours and his hustle to get us in and out in the time allotted. It was perfect and thankfully we got good weather too
place: Stonehenge, Windsor Castle, and Bath from London
